200.description: User Logged In and JWT Token Generated

post.description:
**Create New Session Proposal**

All date-time fields must follow the ISO 8601 format:

**Date Format (ISO 8601):** (YYYY-MM-DD)T(HH:MM:SS)Z
Example: 2025-02-15T12:00:00Z

delete.description: Delete Session Proposal. Only It's own User session proposal can delete.

patch.description:
Update Session Proposal

All date-time fields must follow the ISO 8601 format:

**Date Format (ISO 8601):** (YYYY-MM-DD)T(HH:MM:SS)Z
Example: 2025-02-15T12:00:00Z

put.description: Approve Session Proposal. Only Event Coordinator can approve.
Decline Session Proposal. Only Event Coordinator can decline.

delete.description: Delete Session. Only It's own User session or Event Coordinator can delete.

patch.description:
**Update Session**. Only It's own User session or Event Coordinator can update.

All date-time fields must follow the ISO 8601 format:

**Date Format (ISO 8601):** (YYYY-MM-DD)T(HH:MM:SS)Z
Example: 2025-02-15T12:00:00Z

delete.description: Delete User. Only Admin can delete user.

put.description: Update Role User. Only Admin can update role user.

description.example: A conference focused on the latest advancements in technology and innovation.
A conference focused on the latest advancements in technology and innovation.
